details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.11 Metadata - 8.11.1 General - Metadata key in the Catalog
details.description: The Catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3. The metadata stream dictionary shall contain entry Type with value /Metadata and entry Subtype with value /XML

rule.description: The Catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3. The metadata stream dictionary shall contain entry Type with value /Metadata and entry Subtype with value /XML

error.message: The document catalog dictionary doesn't contain metadata key or metadata stream dictionary does not contain either entry Type with value /Metadata or entry Subtype with value /XML
